inspection_items:
物料，出卷方向与DIT和工单信息一致
Base roll, wind direction match with DIT and Job sheet
inspection_frequency:
每份工单开始时
Beginning of each order

inspection_items:
根据DIT检查产品，对照稿图和工单检查打印出来的产品布局与可变信息一致
Check printed products against DIT, Artwork and Job sheet for layout and variable information verification
inspection_frequency:
每份工单开始时
Beginning of each order
method:
对照DIT/稿图/布局目测
DIT / Artwork / Layout

inspection_items:
条形码扫描内容与打印可读内容一致
Barcode scan information match with printed human readable information
inspection_frequency:
每单的第一片和最后一片
First and last piece of each order
method:
M9090，M9020系列（或等效设备）
M9090, M9020 series(or equivalent equipment)

inspection_items:
条形码扫描等级
- 与打印方向平行的条形码，等级为A/B则通过
- 与打印方向垂直的条形码，等级为A/B/C则通过
- UQ俄罗斯客户二维码类型为GS1（根据客人要求进行检查）
Barcode scan grading
- For 1D 'Fence' barcode grading pass if A/B
- For 1D 'Ladder' barcode grading pass if A/B/C
- UQ-RU datamatrix has to be GS1 type (For 2D barcode check 
based on customer requirement)
inspection_frequency:
每张工单第一片与最后一片
First and last piece of each order
method:
M9090，M9020系列TruCheck，Webscan（或等效设备）智能手机&Cognex App（适用于二维码）
M9090, M9020 seriesTruCheck, Webscan(or equivalent equipment)

inspection_items:
检查打印质量和整体外观
Check for print quality and general appearance
inspection_frequency:
1）至少每单前5片
2）更换物料/墨水后5片1)
Minimum first 5 pcs of each order
2) 5 pcs after changing baseroll/ribbon
method:
对照样品或者样品卡
Visual against samples / tolerance

inspection_items:
检查可变信息（尺码，UPC，款式，等等）
Check variable information (size, UPC, Style, etc)
inspection_frequency:
每个SKU第一片
First piece of each SKU
method:
对照工单目测
Visual against Job sheet

inspection_items:
检查印刷质量和外观
Check for print quality and general appearance
inspection_frequency:
至少每个SKU的前中后各5片
Minumum 5 pcs at the beginning, middle and end of each SKU
method:
对照样品或者样品卡
Visual against samples / tolerance

inspection_items:
- 检查EPC可读性，是否有重复，Schema和数量
- 根据客人的要求检查条形码和EPC匹配
- 根据客人的要求检查产品外观质量
- 每个SKU均满足客户要求数量
- Check EPC readability, duplication, schema and quantity
- Check Barcode & EPC matching if required
- Check for print quality and general appearance
- Correct Qty for each SKU
inspection_frequency:
按照标准抽检计划或客人的特殊要求（UQ 100%全检）
Follow standard sampling chart or Customer specific standards (UQ 100% inspection)
method:
FX9500（或同等效设备）
(or equivalent equipment)

inspection_items:
按照公司标准和客户要求进行包装
Packing per AD standard packing requirement & customer requirement

-确认单货一致，无混装，漏装问题
-Check the job jacket and goods are the same, no mixed or missing
-确认出货地址信息正确，称重并打印外箱贴
--Confirm that the shipping address information is correct, weigh and print the outer box sticker
